meta.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions - AI Concept Builder

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Here you'll find answers to the most important questions about the AI Concept Builder and our services.

q1.question: What is the AI Concept Builder?
q1.answer: The AI Concept Builder is an innovative platform that helps entrepreneurs create professional business plans with the help of artificial intelligence. Our platform offers structured templates, personalized consulting, and comprehensive support for all aspects of business formation.

q2.question: Who is the AI Concept Builder suitable for?
list: Startups that need a business plan
Entrepreneurs who want to apply for funding
Established companies with new business areas

q3.question: Can I test the service for free?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer a free initial consultation and limited access to our basic features. You can register and test the first steps of business plan creation for free. For advanced features and personal consulting, you need one of our packages.

q1.question: How does the AI assistant work?
q1.answer: Our AI assistant analyzes your inputs and creates personalized content for your business plan. It:
list: Asks targeted questions about your business idea
Generates text suggestions based on your answers
Provides improvement suggestions for your plan

q2.question: Which business plan templates are available?
q2.answer: We offer specialized templates for various industries:
q2.additional: All templates are fully customizable and include industry-specific examples and metrics.

q3.question: In which formats can I export my business plan?
q3.answer: You can export your business plan in various formats:

q1.question: What is the difference between the packages?
q1.answer: Our packages differ in scope and support:
q1.additional: Detailed information can be found on our pricing page.

q2.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
q2.answer: We accept all common payment methods:
q2.additional: All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

q3.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without giving reasons. The cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. Your data and created business plans remain available for 30 days after cancellation.

q1.question: What are the system requirements?
q1.answer: The AI Concept Builder works in all modern web browsers:
q1.additional: The application is completely web-based and responsive - it works on desktop, tablet and smartphone.

q2.question: How secure is my data?
q2.answer: Data security has the highest priority:
list: SSL encryption for all data transmissions
Servers in German data centers (GDPR compliant)

q3.question: Can I work offline?
q3.answer: Limited yes. The application saves your work locally and automatically synchronizes it as soon as an internet connection is available. However, the AI assistant and consulting functions require an active internet connection.

q1.question: How long does it take to create a business plan?
q1.answer: The duration depends on the complexity of your business idea:
q1.additional: The AI assistant significantly speeds up the process by providing text suggestions and structuring help.

q2.question: Can I get professional feedback on my plan?
q2.answer: Yes! Our experts offer various consulting services:
q2.additional: Depending on the package, 1-5 consulting hours are included or can be booked individually.

q3.question: Is the business plan suitable for banks and investors?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Our business plans meet all standards:
q3.additional: Over 85% of our customers successfully receive financing or funding.

q2.question: Are there tutorials or guides?
q2.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive learning materials:

q3.question: What should I do if I have technical problems?
list_ordered: Clear browser cache and reload page
Test another browser or incognito mode
q3.additional: Our technical support responds within 2 hours.
